resources.string: This app wants to access your location.
Let Google help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to Google, even when no apps are running.

Material Dialogs is a library designed and developed by Aidan Follestad. As of 2018, Aidan currently works on the Square Device Experience team at Square.

Thanks for using Material Dialogs!
